name: Shiinotic
description: Its flickering spores lure in prey and put them to sleep. Once this Pokémon has its prey snoozing, it drains their vitality with its fingertips.

attacks.name: Flickering Light
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent’s next turn, the Defending Pokémon can’t attack.

attacks.name: Fear the Forest
attacks.effect: If Glimwood Tangle is in play, this attack does 60 more damage.
